name: part_009
file: tmp_【#myth4EVER】hololive English -Myth- 4th Anniversary Concert： The Show Goes On! [CDljbqawDkw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Watson Amelia, Gawr Gura, and Ninomae Ina'nis perform 'end of a life'.
MC section where the members discuss their previous performances and the concert title.
The full Hololive English -Myth- unit performs their original song 'The Show Goes On!'.

subtitles.original: I'll keep on dancing...
subtitles.english: I'll keep on dancing...

subtitles.original: ...through the night haze...
subtitles.english: ...through the night haze...

subtitles.original: ...it was so fast to this cold jump...
subtitles.english: ...it was so fast to this cold jump...

subtitles.original: ...tell the truth now...
subtitles.english: ...tell the truth now...

subtitles.original: ...you know it's time we're the same ones...
subtitles.english: ...you know it's time we're the same ones...

subtitles.original: ...waking up now to the real life...
subtitles.english: ...waking up now to the real life...

subtitles.original: ...lemme daydream 'til the next night...
subtitles.english: ...lemme daydream 'til the next night...

subtitles.english: I'll keep waiting...

subtitles.english: ...now the crowd's gone...

subtitles.english: ...is it over?

subtitles.original: Is it over...
subtitles.english: Is it over...

subtitles.original: (Exhales)
subtitles.english: (Exhales)

subtitles.original: Hello everyone!
subtitles.english: Hello everyone!

subtitles.original: Thank you for joining us tonight!
subtitles.english: Thank you for joining us tonight!

subtitles.original: Thank you!
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: So, how has it been so far?
subtitles.english: So, how has it been so far?

subtitles.original:
How did you guys like my rendition
of Mori Calliope's "Future Island"?
subtitles.english:
How did you guys like my rendition
of Mori Calliope's "Future Island"?

subtitles.original: It was amazing!
subtitles.english: It was amazing!

subtitles.original:
Oh my god! Ina, so cute!
So cute, so cute, so cute!
subtitles.english:
Oh my god! Ina, so cute!
So cute, so cute, so cute!

subtitles.original: Thank you!
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: And Gura performed Kiara's "Chimera"!
subtitles.english: And Gura performed Kiara's "Chimera"!

subtitles.original: Whoo!
subtitles.english: Whoo!

subtitles.original: Gura, you're so cute!
subtitles.english: Gura, you're so cute!

subtitles.original:
And you performed it so well!
It's like... seeing Kiara, but... true!
subtitles.english:
And you performed it so well!
It's like... seeing Kiara, but... true!

subtitles.original: And Ame! My piece was Ina's "Violet".
subtitles.english: And Ame! My piece was Ina's "Violet".

subtitles.original:
How does it feel having your own
song performed in front of you?
subtitles.english:
How does it feel having your own
song performed in front of you?

subtitles.original: I mean, I always love it when you sing...
subtitles.english: I mean, I always love it when you sing...

subtitles.original:
...and you bring a new energy to the song!
I liked it!
subtitles.english:
...and you bring a new energy to the song!
I liked it!

subtitles.original:
And just now, the three of us
performed "end of a life".
subtitles.english:
And just now, the three of us
performed "end of a life".

subtitles.original:
And we want to make things fresh and exciting,
so as you can probably tell...
subtitles.english:
And we want to make things fresh and exciting,
so as you can probably tell...

subtitles.original:
...we've been singing each other's
original songs tonight!
subtitles.english:
...we've been singing each other's
original songs tonight!

subtitles.original: And now we have two more songs that,
subtitles.english: And now we have two more songs that,

subtitles.original: you know, you guys can enjoy.
subtitles.english: you know, you guys can enjoy.

subtitles.original: Two more songs! Oh man!
subtitles.english: Two more songs! Oh man!

subtitles.original:
But ladies, don't forget about the title
of our live concert tonight.
subtitles.english:
But ladies, don't forget about the title
of our live concert tonight.

subtitles.original: "The Show Goes On!" And it will!
subtitles.english: "The Show Goes On!" And it will!

subtitles.original: Yes! Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yes! Yeah!

subtitles.original: So everyone, everyone, don't click away!
subtitles.english: So everyone, everyone, don't click away!

subtitles.original: Don't! Don't! I see you!
subtitles.english: Don't! Don't! I see you!

subtitles.original: Our next song will kind of deviate from our,
subtitles.english: Our next song will kind of deviate from our,

subtitles.original:
the shuffle that we've been doing,
but you're going to love it just as much, right?
subtitles.english:
the shuffle that we've been doing,
but you're going to love it just as much, right?

subtitles.original: That's right! Yeah!
subtitles.english: That's right! Yeah!

subtitles.original:
Well, in that case,
let's not keep our guests waiting!
subtitles.english:
Well, in that case,
let's not keep our guests waiting!

subtitles.original: Up next is our penultimate piece!
subtitles.english: Up next is our penultimate piece!

subtitles.original: Enjoy!
subtitles.english: Enjoy!

subtitles.original: Enjoy!
subtitles.english: Enjoy!

subtitles.original: One, two, three!
subtitles.english: One, two, three!

subtitles.original:
The Show Goes On!
Lyrics: Steph Music, Arrangement: 山下智輝
subtitles.english:
The Show Goes On!
Lyrics: Steph Music, Arrangement: Yamashita Tomoki

subtitles.original: Light the floodlights, let's begin
subtitles.english: Light the floodlights, let's begin

subtitles.original: We'll start stage right and shuffle on in
subtitles.english: We'll start stage right and shuffle on in

subtitles.original: (It's time for Myth, ready to steal the show!)
subtitles.english: (It's time for Myth, ready to steal the show!)

subtitles.original: We're jumping with joy, let's go!
subtitles.english: We're jumping with joy, let's go!

subtitles.original: Curtain's up, so cue the band
subtitles.english: Curtain's up, so cue the band

subtitles.original: We'll keep on entertaining hand in hand
subtitles.english: We'll keep on entertaining hand in hand

subtitles.original: It's our greatest moment yet
subtitles.english: It's our greatest moment yet

subtitles.original: A spectacle they'll never forget!
subtitles.english: A spectacle they'll never forget!

subtitles.original: (We're all aglow, party from dusk to dawn)
subtitles.english: (We're all aglow, party from dusk to dawn)

subtitles.original: (The show will go on and on!)
subtitles.english: (The show will go on and on!)

subtitles.original: Tell them that we're here to stay and
subtitles.english: Tell them that we're here to stay and

subtitles.original: Spread the news from Tokyo to Broadway!
subtitles.english: Spread the news from Tokyo to Broadway!

subtitles.original: Gleaming
subtitles.english: Gleaming

subtitles.original: (Ooh!) Spotlight
subtitles.english: (Ooh!) Spotlight

subtitles.original:
Get the gang together,
we're boogieing all night
subtitles.english:
Get the gang together,
we're boogieing all night

subtitles.original: Beaming
subtitles.english: Beaming

subtitles.original: (Ooh!) So bright
subtitles.english: (Ooh!) So bright

subtitles.english: Now we're feeling all right!

subtitles.original:
Since the day we met,
we've all been going strong
subtitles.english:
Since the day we met,
we've all been going strong

subtitles.english: (It's been so long, ooh!)

subtitles.english: And we'll keep moving right along!

subtitles.original:
Ain't nothing gonna stop us,
we're a perfect quintet!
subtitles.english:
Ain't nothing gonna stop us,
we're a perfect quintet!

subtitles.original: (In harmony no matter where we go)
subtitles.english: (In harmony no matter where we go)

subtitles.original: (It's meant to be, don't you know?)
subtitles.english: (It's meant to be, don't you know?)

subtitles.original: We're gonna feel so alive when it's us five
subtitles.english: We're gonna feel so alive when it's us five

subtitles.original: Ready to put on another show!
subtitles.english: Ready to put on another show!

subtitles.original: There's a ton to celebrate
subtitles.english: There's a ton to celebrate

subtitles.original: The mood is fun and we're feeling great!
subtitles.english: The mood is fun and we're feeling great!

subtitles.original: From the rafters to the aisles
subtitles.english: From the rafters to the aisles

subtitles.original: Contagious laughter and our biggest smiles!

subtitles.original: We'll slay 'em like we always do
